name: part_010
file: tmp_【 #博衣こより2周年ライブ 】想い出をライブで届けるMemories & Future!! ＜ゲスト多数！感謝✨＞【3D LIVE】 [wg4-Un6zTiU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Seishun Archive' with guests: Houshou Marine, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, Sakura Miko, Oozora Subaru, Ookami Mio, Ceres Fauna, Moona Hoshinova, Nekomata Okayu, and IRyS.
MC section where Koyori thanks her guests and introduces her second new original song of the day, 'Tear-Gazer', for which she wrote the lyrics.
Performance of Koyori's new original song 'Tear-Gazer'.

subtitles.original: ...をたぐり寄せるように
subtitles.english: ...as if reeling it in

subtitles.original: 期待外れだと誰かが嘆く
subtitles.english: Someone laments that it's disappointing

subtitles.original: 行きたいと痛いがいつも戦う
subtitles.english: "I want to go" and "it hurts" are always at odds

subtitles.original: プライドだけを頼りに抗う
subtitles.english: Fighting back, relying only on pride

subtitles.original: 自分を信じたい
subtitles.english: I want to believe in myself

subtitles.original: 努力は報われる
subtitles.english: Effort will be rewarded

subtitles.original: 笑いたい奴は笑ってろ
subtitles.english: Let those who want to laugh, laugh

subtitles.original: 感傷に浸ってる暇はない
subtitles.english: I have no time to wallow in sentimentality

subtitles.original: 今世紀最大の
subtitles.english: The greatest of this century...

subtitles.original: 今夜が始まる
subtitles.english: ...tonight begins!

subtitles.original: Woah 反響が足りない もっともっと
subtitles.english: Woah, the resonance isn't enough, more, more!

subtitles.original: Woah
subtitles.english: Woah

subtitles.original: 後悔はさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let you regret it

subtitles.original: Woah
subtitles.english: Woah

subtitles.original: 想像の果てにある高み
subtitles.english: The heights at the end of imagination

subtitles.original: Woah
subtitles.english: Woah

subtitles.original: 勝ち獲った景色は尊い
subtitles.english: The scenery we won is precious

subtitles.original: Woah
subtitles.english: Woah

subtitles.original: 逃げるな 限界の壁超えて
subtitles.english: Don't run away, cross the wall of limits

subtitles.original: Woah
subtitles.english: Woah

subtitles.original: 僕らはまだチャレンジャー
subtitles.english: We're still challengers

subtitles.original: (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: Woah...
subtitles.english: Woah...

subtitles.original: Woah...
subtitles.english: Woah...

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌ってくださったゲストの皆さん、本当にありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: To all the guests who sang with me, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: それでは続いて、未来へと繋げていく、本日2曲目の新しいオリジナル曲です！
subtitles.english: Now, moving on, here's the second new original song of the day, connecting us to the future!

subtitles.original: なんと今回、こよ、初めて作詞に挑戦いたしました！
subtitles.english: And for this one, I, Koyo, challenged myself with writing lyrics for the first time!

subtitles.original: みんなへの応援ソングです。聴いてください、Tear-Gazer。
subtitles.english: It's a support song for everyone. Please listen: Tear-Gazer.

subtitles.original: 涙越えてゆけ
subtitles.english: Go beyond the tears

subtitles.original: ほら ほら ほら
subtitles.english: See, see, see

subtitles.original: いっくよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: ぽつり漏れた
subtitles.english: A single sigh escaped

subtitles.original: 幸せが逃げちゃいそうで 吐いたため息
subtitles.english: Fearful that happiness might slip away

subtitles.original: ねえ 鏡の中
subtitles.english: Hey, in the mirror

subtitles.original: 無理な笑顔に 唇 歪む
subtitles.english: My lips twist into a forced smile

subtitles.original: どうして 僕だけ うまくいかないのかな
subtitles.english: Why is it that only I can't seem to make things work?

subtitles.original: 独りよがりだとわかってる
subtitles.english: I know I'm being self-centered...

subtitles.original: (わかるよ)
subtitles.english: (I understand)

subtitles.original: 自信をなくして 崩れ落ちた時
subtitles.english: When I lost confidence and crumbled

subtitles.original: 君の声がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I heard your voice

subtitles.original: 精一杯 目一杯
subtitles.english: With all my might, with everything I've got

subtitles.original: 矛盾だらけ迷路の中で
subtitles.english: Inside this maze full of contradictions

subtitles.original: 等身大 手に未来の鍵を見つけ出せ
subtitles.english: Just as you are, find the key to the future in your hand

subtitles.original: No way どんな難題でも
subtitles.english: No way, no matter how difficult the challenge

subtitles.original: 満身創痍で弾き返せ
subtitles.english: Repel it even if you're battered and bruised

subtitles.original: へこたれたって まだまだ前進
subtitles.english: Even if you're discouraged, keep moving forward

subtitles.original: 3, 2, 1, Find high!
subtitles.english: 3, 2, 1, Find high!

subtitles.original: Go my way どこまでも
subtitles.english: Go my way, to the ends of the earth

subtitles.original: 諦めない 諦めないからさ
subtitles.english: Because I won't give up, I won't give up

subtitles.original: 涙越えてゆけ ほら ほら ほら
subtitles.english: Go beyond the tears, see, see, see

subtitles.original: そう 君の前で
subtitles.english: That's right, in front of you...

subtitles.original: 笑ってみせる 強がりな僕だけど
subtitles.english: ...I'll show you my smile, even if I'm just acting tough

subtitles.original: 毛布の中一人で 涙流す日もある
subtitles.english: There are days when I shed tears alone under the covers

subtitles.original: 孤独の戦士だ
subtitles.english: I'm a lonely warrior

subtitles.original: 自分に正直な 「やりたい」に真っ直ぐな
subtitles.english: Honest with myself, true to what I "want to do"

subtitles.original: 君だけの頻度でありたい
subtitles.english: I want to be at a frequency just for you

subtitles.original: (最高！)
subtitles.english: (Awesome!)

subtitles.original: 悔しさを重ねて 駆け上がっていこう
subtitles.english: Accumulating regrets, let's keep climbing up

subtitles.original: ねえ 今はまだ道の途中
subtitles.english: Hey, we're still in the middle of the journey

subtitles.original: きっと
subtitles.english: Surely...

subtitles.original: 絶対諦めない
subtitles.english: I'll never give up

subtitles.original: ガンバってること 知ってるよ
subtitles.english: I know how hard you're working

subtitles.original: 涙の理由も 知ってるよ
subtitles.english: I know the reason for your tears, too
